name: RYD OR DIE
description:
A roguelike dungeon crawler with a fun Job System. Each job has 2 abilities that enhance 2 of the players stats. Level up the player by defeating enemies and have your stats grow based on your job choice. Leveling up jobs not only increases how much they enhance your abilities but will eventually lead to mastery. Mastering a job permanently increases your stat growth for every level AND unlocks even more JOBS. Fight through increasingly stronger enemies in 3 different biomes. Experience all 16 jobs, from Thief to Janitor, in RYD OR DIE.

-Made in 2 Weeks for Global Game Jam 2022

Credits -

  • Fred Schmidt - Project Lead, Design, Game Programmer - @seracrooce
  • Gizmo199- Lead Programmer, Systems Engineer, UI Programmer 
  • Matt Gifford - Art Lead
  • Sora Chung - Programming
  • Ryan Kuster - Graphics/Animation
  • Chris McRae - Composer
  • Brandon Wheatley - Sound Design
